title: CODEMANIA 2k24
content: Get ready to unleash your coding potential in the ultimate CSI Coding Competition! Whether you're a seasoned programmer or just starting out, this challenge is designed to push your limits and spark your creativity. Compete against the brightest minds, solve complex problems, and showcase your skills in an electrifying environment. With exciting prizes up for grabs and a platform to demonstrate your coding prowess, this is your chance to shine. Donâ€™t miss out on this thrilling opportunity to take your coding journey to the next level!

title: ACESS 2024
content: AGNEL COMPUTER ENGINEERING STUDENTS SYMPOSIUM Another annual event of the Computer Society Of India, at FCRIT, Vashi.Industry experts were invited for a seminar for S.E and T.E students. Access seminar are conducted to increase participants' understanding of the thoughtful application of technology to the resolution of practical issues. With their insights into cutting-edge technologies like augmented reality (AR), virtual reality (VR), and web XR, these lectures offer an interesting teaching platform. They increase participants' technological aptitude and awe, inspiring the discovery of fresh technological horizons. The Access seminar series is known for its dedication to bringing together students and industrialists, bridging the gap between academia and the working world
location: First and Second Floor Seminar Hall, FCRIT
tagLine: Lorem ipsum is a placeholder or dummy text

title: CODEMANIA 2k23
content: Explore the world of Minecraft in our past CSI Coding Contest! Participants had 90 minutes to tackle challenges set in the virtual terrains of Minecraft, testing their coding skills and creativity. With a prize pool of Rs 6,000, the event was a unique blend of fun and coding prowess. Missed it? Stay tuned for future events that promise exciting challenges and opportunities to showcase your skills!
tagLine: Lorem ipsum is a placeholder or dummy text

title: ACESS 1.0 2023
content: The 'ACESS' event was enriched by the resource person's exemplary instruction in human values. Throughout the event, the resource person emphasized empathy, respect, and integrity in professional communication. They shared practical examples highlighting the role of these values in resolving conflicts, building trust, and fostering positive relationships in various careers. By integrating these values into discussions, the resource person imparted wisdom and encouraged attendees to adopt a compassionate and ethical approach in their professional journeys. This perspective underlined that, beyond technical skills, embodying human values distinguishes outstanding professionals and contributes significantly to their success

title: CRYPTEX
content: Annual event of the Computer Society of India (CSI).3-day workshop events for S.E students to introduce them to the fundamentals of the most in-demand domains in the computer industry. Tracks: UI/UX, AIML, Web development, Open source and Github.
tagLine: Lorem ipsum is a placeholder or dummy text

title: TECHNIGHT HACKATHON 2023
content: Immerse yourself in the thrill of innovation at our past National-Level Hackathon! Held online on March 4th and 5th, 2022, this 24-hour event brought together the brightest minds to tackle challenges in fintech, AI, blockchain, video games, health, and cybersecurity. Participants competed for a chance to win prizes totaling Rs. 20,000 along with exciting goodies. The hackathon provided a platform for aspiring innovators and developers to showcase their skills, collaborate on cutting-edge projects, and push the boundaries of technology.Although the event has concluded, the spirit of creativity and collaboration continues. Stay tuned for future hackathons, where new challenges and opportunities await. Thank you to all the participants who made this past event a resounding success!
tagLine: Lorem ipsum is a placeholder or dummy text

title: TECHNOBLITZ PRESENTATION 2023
content: Technical Poster Presentation event, held on September 24, 2023, at FCRIT, Vashi. This dynamic event saw participants delving into the fascinating domains of Data Science (AIML) and Cybersecurity, each presentation showcasing innovative solutions and insightful projects. The competition was fierce as participants vied for a prize pool exceeding Rs. 16,000, with a coveted Rs. 4,500 cash prize awaiting the most outstanding presentation. We extend our heartfelt gratitude to all participants for contributing to the success of this event and making it a platform for the exchange of ideas and technological advancements.
